full_summary:
## Underpinning and Renovation Work for Residential Building in London, England

### Reference Number and Publication Date

Reference Number: `PW-23-01028673`
Publication Date: `2023-03-03`

### Tender Details

**Tender Title**: Underpinning and Renovation Work for Residential Building in London, England
**Tender Status**: Expired
**Tender Closing Date**: `2023-03-20T14:00:00`

### Description of Work

This project involves underpinning the ground floor foundations of a residential townhome at a High Commission of Canada to the United Kingdom. The project includes removing sections of the ground floor living room, dining room, and kitchen, and reinstalling and decorating the spaces to meet the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work.

### Scope of Work

The underpinning work will include:

* Removing sections of the ground floor foundations
* Reinstalling and re-decorating the spaces to meet the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work
* Ensuring excellent quality in architectural, mechanical, electrical, structural, and construction fields

### Eligibility and Registration

Suppliers must be capable of providing the full range of services required in English or French. Interested suppliers must be pre-qualified according to the requirements outlined in the Request for Qualification (RQ) published on CanadaBuys (RQ 23-227191).

### Contact Information

Contact person: Tanya DiVirgilio
Email: `realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca`
Phone: `343-573-0472`
Address: `125 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0G2, Canada`

### Notice

Canada is not required to delay the solicitation nor the award of any resulting contract. The Minister will not reimburse expenditures incurred by respondents responding to this notice.

### Additional Information

The bid solicitation is open to suppliers who meet the mandatory requirements for prequalification as described in RQ 23-227191. Interested suppliers may request more information by sending an email to the contact person above. Make sure to include "NPP 23-227191" in the subject line. After rephrasing the most important details and providing the necessary information in a more readable format, I was able to shorten the response to 400 words.
